In accordance to your recent discussion this letter will confirm that the following shall be the terms and conditions of your Employment with Futurenet Technologies (India)Private Limited.
You are appointed as "
”
of the Company effective from "
”
. As such, you shall perform the duties assigned to you from time to time by the designated senior as mentioned in Job Description. Terms and Conditions of Employment as follows.
1.
You will be on probation for a period of 6 (Six) months from the date of joining. The period of probation is subject to extension at the discretion of the management of the Company, by another period of 6 (Six) months. Confirmation of employment following the probation period will not be construed to have taken place unless you are informed in writing by the Company to that effect.
a.
During the period of probation, your services may be terminated by the Company by giving notice of one month without assigning any reason thereof. Similarly, during the period of probation, you may terminate the contract by giving one-month notice to the Company. However, the formalities of submitting proper letter of resignation and obtaining no-dues certificate from all concerned shall have to be complied with.
b.
Your total CTC will be
/- (
)
per month payable by 5th working day of the next English calendar month for the previous month. Details of such remuneration are provided in Salary Emoluments. All Payments made to you will be subject to deductions required by law including deductions in respect of tax and such other deduction and/or contributions as shall be made pursuant to the Applicable laws and policies and procedures of the Company.

div.div: In the Event of your Voluntary Separation from the organisation within 18 months of appointment date, you will have to repay Rs. 25,000/- the expenses incurred towards your training.

In the event, the Company provides any specialized training to you, either in India or abroad and undertakes expenditure for this purpose, you will be required to enter into a minimum Service Period Agreement. The terms of the minimum Service Period Agreement will be in addition to those stated herein and in the Standing Orders, if applicable.

On confirmation as a regular employee, you will be required to give two months’ notice, in case you decide to leave the company. In the event of you having any incomplete assignment, the Company will have the discretion to relieve you immediately or only at the end of the Two months’ notice period. On disciplinary grounds the company may terminate your services immediately.
During your Service with the company, you will abide by the rules and regulations of the company as applicable from time to time.

The Company reserves the right to make changes to any of your terms and conditions of employment in writing. You will be given not less than one month's written notice of any significant changes that may be given by way of an individual notice. Such changes will be deemed to be accepted unless you notify the Company of any objection in writing before the expiry of the notice period.

You shall keep confidential at any time during or after your employment, any information (including proprietary or confidential information) about the business and affairs of, or belonging to the Company or any subsidiary of the Company or their respective customers or suppliers, including information which, though technically not trade secrets, the dissemination or knowledge whereof might prove prejudicial to the Company or its subsidiaries. You may be asked to sign a confidentiality agreement with the Company in this regard.
Your services can be transferred to any of our Units / Departments / Client Location situated anywhere in India or abroad.

You will keep informed of your correct address in Chennai and your permanent address. Any change of address in present or permanent address should be communicated to the management immediately or maximum within 7 days of such change.

During your employment, you shall work exclusively for the Company and shall not engage in any other employment, trade, business or profession or work as an employee or in any other capacity, directly or indirectly, for any other person.
a.
You agree that you will not solicit any time after the termination of your employment any of the Company’s employees, directly or indirectly, or encourage any Company employee to leave the Company.
b.

You further agree that, for a period of 12 (Twelve) months from the date on which this Agreement is terminated, you will not be associated, as an employee, agent, consultant, advisor, independent contractor, partner, officer, director, of any corporation, Partnership, or other entity, which is similar to, or in competition with, the business of the Company, or of any associated company.
c.

During the period of employment, you shall not engage yourself in any other business or employment, academic or professional course without obtaining the prior permission in writing from the management

It is hereby understood and agreed by you and the Company, that this letter agreement shall come into effect on the date of your countersignature hereto; provided, however, that your employment with the Company shall be conditioned upon the fulfilment of any prerequisites specified in this letter or any annexure hereto, including but not limited to, verification of your antecedents and testimonials as furnished/claimed by you to the Company prior to your joining.

If the terms and conditions of appointment enumerated in this appointment are acceptable to you, then please confirm your acceptance by signing on the duplicate copy of this document, and return it to the Company within 3 (Three) days of receiving this letter, failing which the offer will stand withdrawn as your action shall be deemed to be refusal to accept the same
a.

It is acknowledged by you that as a condition of your continued employment, you will be required to comply in every respect with the Company’s policies and procedures as may be in effect from time to and which may be changed by the Company at any time at its discretion without any requirement to obtain your consent or approval or to notify you of the same unless you are covered under Standing Orders. The Company’s Policies, as may be modified from time to time and once issued, shall form an integral part of this offer letter and the contract between you and the Company.
You will automatically retire on attaining the age of 58 (fifty-eight) years unless otherwise informed in writing by the management of the Company.
Your employment is subject to your being medically fit.
